title: Father arrested after 4 children left home alone, police say
body: FRESNO, Calif () — Fresno Police say someone reported two young children left alone in a front yard in Southeast Fresno.  Fresno Police got a call about a child in a diaper by itself and another child in a hi-chair in the front yard near Peach and Olive Ave. When police arrived, they found four children, all under the age of 5 years old.The oldest child told police their parents were at work.Police say the children were found in deplorable conditions.Two children were found outside wandering around in diapers, 1 through the window and 1 inside.The father, Joshua Yang, was eventually located and placed under arrest; the mother has not been located.
